Summary: bright orange sphere turned star like and asended out of sight
divs: sighting detailson new years eve around 9pm i and 3 friends were having dinner outside. i was seated facing west and looked up to the sky and noticed a bright orange\red circle of light. immediately i stood up and said ���hey, what is that?��� there were no navigation lights visible, no strobe flashing and was very close to luke air force base which is about 6 miles west of our location. it appeared to cut to the south briefly then north all while moving east directly towards us. no sound could be heard and it stayed a constant glow. just short of being directly overhead of us it stopped and hovered for about 5 seconds then turned into an incredibly bright white light, and shot straight up and appeared to be a star in a matter of a split second then faded out of sight. it was too high to begin with to be any type of fireworks not to mention traveling horizontally for too great a distance. this was not any type of aircraft that we are familiar with. later that same evening it was witnessed again, by 2 other friends and was described exactly the same, as turning into a star.
